name: Steel Slicing ASMR
description:
The most satisfying ASMR steel slicing game for stress relief!
You may have seen viral metal slicing videos before, but now you can cut and slice steel to your satisfaction while listening to relaxing sounds right at your fingertips—without the mess of course!
Game Features:
- Realistic steel cutting and slicing simulator
- A variety of objects to cut, slice, and dice
- Smooth haptic feedback
- Relaxing ASMR sounds
